description: Creates a billing group. If this call is made multiple times using the same billing group name and configuration, the call will succeed. If this call is made with the same billing group name but different configuration a ResourceAlreadyExistsException is thrown. Requires permission to access the CreateBillingGroup action.

parameters.name: billingGroupName
parameters.description: The name you wish to give to the billing group.

parameters.name: billingGroupProperties
parameters.description: The properties of the billing group. billingGroupDescription (string) --- The description of the billing group.

nested_params.name: billingGroupDescription
nested_params.description: The description of the billing group.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Metadata which can be used to manage the billing group. (dict) --- A set of key/value pairs that are used to manage the resource. The tag's key. Value (string) --- The tag's value.

nested_items.name: billingGroupName
nested_items.description: The name you gave to the billing group.

nested_items.name: billingGroupArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the billing group.

nested_items.name: billingGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the billing group.
